metadata.name: The Abduction of Europe
metadata.description: Animated version of my plywood artwork created in 2020 for my solo show called ‘[A Moment Before The Dawn](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8bH8JBeE8pA&t=6s)’. Original piece can be seen [here](https://www.instagram.com/p/CE_Eb1ipKbH/?igshid=MDJmNzVkMjY=) (multilayer relief, 88x260cm, spray paint on plywood). Animation and music made in collaboration with SoldArt collective.
